entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:23 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -33.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clyde River Airport 02:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 68 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
